dc:title: Maryfarm
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes life at Maryfarm during Winter: guests, visitors, gifts of a statue of the Blessed Mother and a phonograph, and pies, furniture repair and refurbishing. Mentions books read as spiritual reading during silent meals.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 945 1954-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
